short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set custom label for aws console dashboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our Chrome extension, Custom Label Setter for AWS Console Dashboard, provides users with the ability to enhance their AWS management experience by adding custom labels to components within their AWS Console dashboards. Designed to streamline organization and facilitate clarity, this extension empowers users to annotate and customize their dashboard widgets with personalized descriptions or labels.
